root.name: Arabian Nights: Sabaku no Seirei-≈ç
root.description: OverviewArabian Nights: Sabaku no Seirei Ou (Arabian Nights: Desert Spirit King) is an Arabian themed Japanese role-playing game about a young girl named Shukran who teams up with a Djinn to save the land. The game was developed by Pandora Box and published by Takara for the Super Famicom on June 14, 1996. Arabian Nights: Desert Spirit King was never localized outside of Japan but on Christmas Day of 2012 an unofficial English translation patch was released by LostTemplar.
